q1: What has Germany done wrong, how did they go from last world cup winners to not even passing the best round
a1: Some coaching decisions, different players and maybe some bad luck even though they didn't play as well or consistently.
q2: Who is actually German in the German team?
a2: The Germany national football team is the men's football team that has represented Germany in international competition since 1908
q3: Is there good diversity on the German team?
a3: Sure, Germany has fewer German players than Italy has.
a4: if the German team can win the euro because it has very good players and they have a very good game
q5: When is the last time the German soccer team has won a world cup?
a5: I believe Germany won last in 2014, defeating Argentina.
